Package Intranet

package Intranet
  • Class Summary
    Class
    Description
    Admin
    The Admin class represents admins' account in intranet system.
    DataBase
    The DataBase class used as a storage for the application.
    LessonsGenerator
    The LessonsGenerator class provides options of generating lessons of the course added by manager.
    Manager
    This class used for managing news and courses, approving students registration, assigning course to teacher, getting statistics of students performance.
    Request
    The Request class used for getting response from some user, it will be send to the DataBase and after the observer can get it and decide to decline or approve this request.
